Administration/Core.name: help/h <command (optional)>
Administration/Core.description: This shows the bot's list of commands.

Administration/Core.name: profile <user (optional)>
Administration/Core.description: This shows a user's profile, given an ID or a mention.

Administration/Core.name: badges [status / equip]
Administration/Core.description: By default or by using `status`, the command shows your current badges. Using `equip` will toggle if they are shown in your profile.

Administration/Core.name: kill
Administration/Core.description: This command is used to log out the bot, or shut it down.

Administration/Core.name: registerall
Administration/Core.description: This command is used to register all users into the database.

Administration/Core.name: setchannel <int>
Administration/Core.description: This command is used to set a channel's EXP gain rate.

Administration/Core.name: channelinfo
Administration/Core.description: This command is used to get a channel's EXP information.

Administration/Core.name: about
Administration/Core.description: This command is used to get the 'about' section of the bot.

Economy.name: gil/money/balance/$ <user, optional>
Economy.description: This command is used to display a user's money.

Economy.name: shop
Economy.description: This command is used to access the shop.

Economy.name: buy <item ID>
Economy.description: This command is used to buy a shop item.

Economy.name: give <user>
Economy.description: This command is used to give a user a certain amount of money.

Economy.name: grant <user>
Economy.description: This command is used to grant a user money.

Economy.name: grantall
Economy.description: This command is used to grant all users money.
